content.text:
# Draft:Traditional Luhya names

Nandasava
Nandasava is a male name among the Luhya people of Kenya.
Meaning
The King of the Luhya tribe who washes people's problems away. A powerful name signifying leadership, cleansing, and problem-solving abilities.
Origin
Traditional Luhya
Gender
Male
Cultural significance
This name carries traditional significance within the Traditional Luhya sub-tribe of the Luhya community, often reflecting the unique context of a child’s birth or symbolic family values.
Shiberenge
Shiberenge is a female name among the Luhya people of Kenya.
Meaning
Dawn of a new era (#1)
Origin
Kisa
Gender
Female
Cultural significance
This name carries traditional significance within the Kisa sub-tribe of the Luhya community, often reflecting the unique context of a child’s birth or symbolic family values.
